body: {"text": "Bula vinaka! Au marautaka meu sota tale kei kemuni", "sourceLanguage": "fj"}
{"text": "Hello! I am happy to meet you again", "sourceLanguage": "en"}
{"id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000", "verifiedTranslation": "Hello! I am very happy to meet you again", "verifier": "Makita"}
